key.name: F
key.desc: Radar scan mode / Radar memory mode

key.name: h
key.desc: Toggle aiming mode / Toggle HUD position

key.name: m
key.desc: Cycle TWS target / Next AJS main mode

key.name: M
key.desc: Toggle MI cursor / Previous AJS main mode
Increase A/A sight distance / Increase radar gain
Decrease A/A sight distance / decrease radar gain
